name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Frugl - All the best deals in one place

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Frugl instantly finds you all the best daily deals from Groupon, Wowcher, Living Social, Travelzoo and many more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Frugl instantly finds you all the best deals from Wowcher, Travelzoo, Groupon, Living Social plus sample sales and low cost activities and products based in the UK. 

Search for what you want and discover a range of great deals based on your destination. Find hair treatments, food/drink offers, holidays, activities and so much more. Frugl makes it easy to locate great value deals, most at 50% off or more. No need to search through a multitude of deal sites, trying to find the best offer. 

Type into the search bar what you're after and you'll be taken to the site based on your keyword. 

Examples: 
Barcelona
Keratin treatment
Manicure London
Personal training
Office chair

The list is endless and with over 25k deals on the site at any one time, you're bound to find what you're looking for!
